org.qbroker.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.event.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JMSEvent

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements Event
    Event is a JMS like message for carrying payload to communicate to a Centralized Repository. It has its own transport method, send(), which can be used to send event to the repository if the logger has been initialized.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
